TotalRun.tooltip: Cumulative flow runtime -- the sum of StageRun for this and all previous stages/labels

StageRun.tooltip: Total runtime for this stage/label.  StageRun = PreRun + CmdRun + RptRun + PostRun

PreRun.tooltip: Runtime to the start of the write_qor_data call for this label/stage.  Counted from the start of the tool session for the first label, or from the end of the previous label's write_qor_data call for all other labels.  If write_qor_data -mark_start_time was used for this label, then PreRun only counts up until that command was called.

RptRun.tooltip: Runtime of the write_qor_data reporting capture for this label/stage

PostRun.tooltip: Runtime from the end of the last label/stage captured by write_qor_data until the tool session ends.  This is only populated for the very last label/stage in a tool session.

Hostname.tooltip: Name of the job's host machine

PeakMem.tooltip: Peak memory usage of parent process in GB

PeakMemAll.tooltip: Peak memory usage of parent and child processes in GB

TotalSwap.tooltip: Total swap space of host machine

FreeSwap.tooltip: Free swap space of host machine

CPUs.tooltip: Total effective CPU threads available (CPUs = Sockets * Cores * Threads)

Threads.tooltip: Number of threads per core.  Typically 1, or 2 if hyperthreading enabled
